text: William Edward Hilsman (May 22, 1900 – 1964) was an American Democratic politician who served in the Missouri General Assembly. He served in the Missouri Senate between 1949 and 1961. Born in St. Louis, Missouri, he was educated in the public schools and parochial schools. On September 8, 1928, Hilsman married Mary Loretto Hayes. He worked in the insurance business and served in the 138th Infantry during World War I. ==References== ==External links== * The Political Graveyard: Index to Politicians, Hillidge to Hinerman Category:1900 births Category:1964 deaths Category:20th-century American politicians Category:Missouri Democrats Category:Missouri state senators Category:Politicians from St. Louis
title: William Hilsman
